author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

This PR updates the HLT GTs created by `autoCondHLT` for MC workflows in `CMSSW_12_4_X`.

This is done to include new payloads for beamspot and HLT Jet/MET calibrations (PF-hadron calibrations, and jet-energy scale corrections), as detailed in the [CMSTalk thread "Strategy for backporting GT updates from 12_5 to 12_4"](https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/strategy-for-backporting-gt-updates-from-12-5-to-12-4/13587), when running the latest version of the HLT menus for `12_4_X`.

This PR is specific to the `12_4_X` release cycle, and it affects only a subset of workflows involving HLT (specifically, the HLT-Validation tests which run in IBs, and the HLT add-on tests). RelVal wfs are not affected by this PR.

#### PR validation:

`addOnTests.py` passed.
